channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 3 Friends Staying in Fla. Vacation Rental Claim Woman Followed Them into Elevator and Accused Them of 'Trespassing' (Exclusive)

Texas can't require Ten Commandments in every public school classroom, judge says
item.description: A federal judge has temporarily blocked Texas from enforcing a new law requiring the Ten Commandments to be posted in every public school classroom

item.title: Rhode Island prosecutor under review after warning 'you're gonna regret this' during arrest
item.description: A Rhode Island prosecutor is under review after police body camera footage recorded her warning officers that they would regret arresting her

item.title: DeSantis awards posthumous Governor's Medal of Freedom to Jimmy Buffett
item.description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis has posthumously awarded five notable Floridians with the Governor’s Medal of Freedom, one of the state’s highest honors
